compliance.highlight: CT-Cloud is a Taiwan-headquartered cybersecurity innovator with an R&D-first culture, delivering globally consistent security with locally compliant execution. Built for distributors, we provide repeatable rollout playbooks and SI-friendly architectures that accelerate deployments, reduce delivery risk, and produce audit-ready evidence for regulated bids. Our roadmap aligns with ISO/IEC 27001, 27036, 27050, ISO 28000, ISO 22313/22318, ISO/IEC 42001 and ISO/IEC 23894, mapped to NIST CSF, and dual-benchmarked to CIS Benchmarks/STIG and Taiwan Cybersecurity Institute requirements. Secure AI Server extends governance into GPU/AI compute operations.

description: Creating Cloud Technology Co., Ltd. (founded in 2011) specializes in cloud management and cyber security technologies. We hold multiple security certifications including ISO 27001:2022. Through our proprietary 'WinNexus' platform, we help enterprises optimize software resources and improve IT management efficiency. We also build stable technical foundations in cloud and AI native service areas.

WinNexus provides lightweight ITSM, asset lifecycle management, software distribution, and IT process automation. It supports software license cost reduction and integration with AD/LDAP/SSO. Furthermore, it strengthens security features such as external device control, user behavior logs, and VANS/GCB modules. It has been deployed in over 50 mid-to-large enterprises and government agencies, managing over 1 million endpoints.

features.title: Scanning
features.description: Performs comprehensive scans of endpoint devices, providing detailed insights into installed software, versioning, usage duration, and frequency.

features.title: Reporting
features.description: Delivers prompt updates on deployment status, tracking software dispatch outcomes per endpoint precisely with diagnostics on deployment issues.

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Active Directory (AD) Server integration for streamlined login control, with optional standalone operation capability.

features.title: Silent Installation
features.description: Quietly executes software updates and hot-fixes in the background, ensuring uninterrupted end-user productivity.

features.title: Licensing Optimization
features.description: Effectively manages software licensing by aligning purchases with actual usage, preventing unnecessary expenditure or shortages.

features.title: Real-Time Reporting
features.description: Instantly provides deployment status, precisely tracking software updates across every device, along with clear diagnostics for any failed deployments.

features.title: Automated Updates
features.description: Optimizes traditionally time-intensive version updates and hotfix deployments through automation and detailed activity logging, providing comprehensive protection while saving administrative time and effort.

features.title: Smart Matching
features.description: Proactively identifies software vulnerabilities based on current NICS / industry cybersecurity standards, allowing immediate remediation without external evaluations.

features.title: Comprehensive Logs
features.description: Maintains detailed logs of all software activities, including installations, removals, and version updates, ensuring complete asset visibility.

features.title: Instant Apply & Restore
features.description: One-Click GCB scanning, deployment, and validation with instant rollback to minimize downtime.

features.title: Visual Dashboards
features.description: Automatically generates intuitive dashboards from GCB compliance data for clear, real-time oversight.

features.title: Detailed Diagnostics
features.description: Detailed deployment reports highlight success rates and identify issues for rapid troubleshooting.

features.title: Unified Management
features.description: Manage GCB settings across OS, browsers, apps, and network firewalls in one streamlined action.

features.title: Real-Time Monitoring
features.description: Continuously monitors and immediately identifies suspicious activities to block threats before exploitation.

features.title: Smart Response
features.description: Leverages global cybersecurity intelligence to support rapid and accurate decision-making.

features.title: File Integrity Logs
features.description: Records detailed file hash changes to prevent malicious tampering and ensure data integrity.

features.title: One-Click Installation
features.description: install or uninstall with a single click, drastically reducing manual effort and costs.

features.title: Email Alerts
features.description: Automatically dispatches email notifications at the first sign of security incidents, enabling immediate response with zero delay.

features.title: 802.1X-Based Access Control
features.description: Utilizes the 802.1X standard to enforce network access policies without requiring additional hardware.

features.title: Manual Device Control
features.description: Administrators can manually allow or block device access on the LAN through centralized interface, ideal for granting exceptions or isolating suspicious endpoints.

features.title: Network Isolation
features.description: Authenticated users are assigned to VLANs based on their identity. VLANs are fully segmented and isolated from each other, ensuring, for example, that guest users cannot access sensitive internal resources.

features.title: Network Topology Visualization
features.description: Provides a real-time, visual representation of all connected devices and their statuses, offering a clear, comprehensive overview of the entire network structure.

features.title: Device Discovery
features.description: Automatically scans network segment, gathering Network Interface details from active devices and verifying agent installation status.

features.title: Geo-Based Manufacturer Screening
features.description: Quickly matches devices to their manufacturers and registered countries, proactively identifying and managing devices form sensitive regions (e.g., China)

features.title: Customizable Real-Time Alerts
features.description: Easily set targeted detection criteria by country and define alert recipients. Instantly issues email notifications to rapidly escalate security responsiveness.

features.title: Access Control Health Checks
features.description: Periodically verifies IoT devices, promptly detecting offline access control systems or surveillance cameras, and issues immediate alerts to mitigate risks from equipment downtime.

features.title: USB & File Management
features.description: USB storage devices, users, and host machines must all comply with security standards to enable USB storage access. All operations and file activities are comprehensively logged in real-time.

features.title: Screen Watermarking
features.description: Customizable watermarking that is displayed prominently upon system startup, effectively deterring unauthorized photography of sensitive information.

features.title: Encryption & Steganography
features.description: Files are automatically encrypted immediately upon closure, ensuring data security. Advanced information concealment techniques are utilized to prevent unauthorized awareness of confidential files.

features.title: Viewing & Screenshot Protection
features.description: Restricts clipboard and screenshot functionalities when sensitive documents are opened, with customizable levels of protection tailored to organizational security requirements.

features.title: Core Architecture
features.description: Based on the NIST SP 800-207 standard, our Zero Trust Architecture (ZTA) utilizes a three-stage approach for dynamic identity verification and authorization, ensuring every access attempt is authenticated and validated.

features.title: Dynamic Trust
features.description: The system dynamically adapts access permissions based on real-time user context and device status, enforcing the principle of least privilege while flexibly responding to emerging threats.

features.title: Local Gateway
features.description: An innovative, decentralized local gateway management solution strategically deployed at key network nodes, precisely controlling device access to implement Zero Trust principles within internal network segments.

features.title: Seamless Integration
features.description: Our ZTA security solution integrates effortlessly with existing security modules ( NAC / VANS / DLP ), fully aligning fully with CISA’s Zero Trust Maturity Model principles. This seamless adaptability ensures a comprehensive and resilient defense architecture.

features.title: Unified Management
features.description: Our AI SASE delivers cloud-native services with centralized control over network traffic and resource allocation, all through Winnexus’s unified management interface.

features.title: Network Data Security
features.description: Built on Zero Trust Network Access (ZTNA) principles, the platform uses SD-WAN for dynamic network management and integrates SWG, FWaaS, and DLP technologies to provide a cost-efficient, high-security data protection solution.

features.title: Secure Remote Access
features.description: Ensure that remote workers can securely access corporate resources from anywhere. A built-in remote access reservation system allows for efficient control and scheduling of access permissions.
